description: Learn how to make my amazing Microwave Mug Pizza recipe in just minutes. You can add any toppings you'd like and it's faster and better than pizza delivery!
keywords: Miccrowave Mug Pizza, Microwave Mug Pizza, Microwave Pizza
name: Microwave Mug Pizza (Microwave Mug Meals)
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon dried Italian herbs (basil or oregano will work)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt together in a microwavable mug.
Add in the milk and oil then mix together. There might be some lumps but that is ok.
Spoon on the marinara sauce and spread it around the surface of the batter.
Sprinkle on the cheese, pepperoni, and dried herbs.
Microwave for 1 minute 10 - 1 minute 20 seconds, or until it rises up and the toppings are bubbling (timing is based on my 1200W microwave so your timing might vary).

Now I have Microwave Mug Recipes for every meal including Mug Pizza (a real Microwave Pizza in minutes!), Macaroni & Cheese, a Chocolate Brownie in a mug & More! You won't believe the delicious and nutritious microwave recipes you can make in just minutes! So let's get micro-baking!
